snippet.title: Scarred - Official Announcement Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Scarred is a first-person atmospheric horror puzzle game where you must uncover the truth about one of your schoolmates before it’s too late. Traverse a world of nightmares inspired by nostalgic Singaporean architecture as you fight to survive. Check out the creepy trailer. Scarred will be available on PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
